attributes.action: ensure that the rights of animals to be free from abuse and ill-treatment is the same inside the laboratories as outside.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it illegal to hurt my pet dogs and cause them pain and distress in my home then it should also be illegal for scientists to do this in laboratories.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
